summary: Project includes an Admin Dashboard gated by admin access logic; backend must expose an isCallerAdmin query used by the frontend to show the Admin tab.
architectural_notes: Frontend admin tab visibility depends on backend query actor.isCallerAdmin(); backend should expose public query isCallerAdmin() returning AccessControl.isAdmin(state, caller).
known_issues: Admin Dashboard not visible because frontend calls actor.isCallerAdmin() but backend does not implement it, causing admin check to fail.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add backend isCallerAdmin() query so frontend can correctly show Admin Dashboard for admins/owner

Implement a public backend query method `isCallerAdmin() : async Bool` in `backend/main.mo` that returns whether the `caller` is an admin according to the existing access-control state (use `AccessControl.isAdmin(accessControlState, caller)`), so the frontend `useIsCallerAdmin()` hook can successfully determine admin status.

projectName: Restore Admin Dashboard visibility by adding missing backend isCallerAdmin query
